description.value:
Trigger Your size increases due to a polymorph effect.

The physical growth of your transformation is a spectacle that shakes foes to their core. Each enemy smaller than your new size within 30 feet of you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}, and you can push it up to 10 feet from you. This is forced movement.
